distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for java-1_8_0-openjdk to version jdk8u77-b03 fixes the following security issue:

* CVE-2016-0636: Improve MethodHandle consistency, which had allowed attackers to execute code. (bsc#972468)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle Java SE 7u97, 8u73, and 8u74 allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors related to the Hotspot sub-component.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
